level.text: The following items are to be considered of an emergency nature and shall be corrected by the owner within twenty-four (24) hours of notice by the
Electrical situation which could result in shock or fire;
No heat when outside temperature is below fifty degrees Farenheit (50ยบ F);
Any other condition the Inspector deems necessary which may cause a threat to tenant’s health or safety.
If the owner does not make the required emergency repairs within twenty-four (24) hours of notice of the owner violations, Housing Assistance Payments shall be abated in accordance with ยง 5329.
If the Family does not make the required emergency repairs within twenty-four (24) hours of notice of the failed Family violation(s), the Family shall be recommended for termination.
